import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Back from "../../components/backButton/back"; import './gameGuide.css'; import LockedIcon from '../../components/map/assets/quiz-locked.svg' import IncompleteIcon from '../../components/map/assets/quiz-icon.svg' import CompleteIcon from '../../components/map/assets/quiz-complete.svg' class GameGuide extends Component { render () { return (

); } } export default GameGuide;
